sentences.english: The glycemic index ranks foods based on how much they raise blood sugar.

sentences.english: Multi-cropping optimized and cropping density increased in wave.

sentences.english: In eccentric type of IV enlargement, the LVMI was increased.
sentences.chinese: 左室離心性擴張型的左室重量指數增加。

sentences.english: Dow Jones plans to create an index for the 2010 Winter Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 道瓊斯公司還計劃爲2010年冬季奧運會設立指數。

sentences.english: High efficient to light, hight color index, energy-saving.

sentences.english: A conjecture of super-universality of the dynamical critical exponent Z is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一個關於臨界動力學指數Z的超普適性猜想。

sentences.english: Low-Glycemic-index vegetables are allowed as well as low-fat cheese, nuts, eggs.
sentences.chinese: 低血糖指數的蔬菜被允許以及低脂奶酪，堅果，雞蛋。

sentences.english: A specimen which is much thicker than the penetration depth decays exponentially.
sentences.chinese: 一個比穿深透度厚得多的樣品，按指數律衰減。

sentences.english: Non-Linear Least Squares were used to estimate the exponential time model.
sentences.chinese: 非線性最小二乘法用於估算指數時間模型。

sentences.english: It suggested that the comprehensive selection index designed in this study was feasible.
sentences.chinese: 因此，該選育方案及選擇指數是可行的。

sentences.english: ConclusionRisperidone effectual procedure showed a rule of exponential curve.
sentences.chinese: 結論維思通的起效過程呈指數曲線規律。

sentences.english: Current PTA market bad factors remains the dollar index and power rationing pressure.
sentences.chinese: 目前PTA市場的利空因素仍是美元指數和限電壓力。

sentences.english: Organic index is higher than standard level of fertility of sediment.
sentences.chinese: 有機指數均高於底泥肥污染標準。

sentences.english: The Application of D'Alembert Equation in Function Equations;
sentences.chinese: 關於變量指數函數的方程。

sentences.english: The colour index of metallic minerals is making new progress in quantitative determination of modern mineralography.
